org.deeplearning4j.word2vec

Class Word2Vec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.word2vec.Word2Vec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Persistable

    public class Word2Vec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistable
    Leveraging a 3 layer neural net with a softmax approach as output, converts a word based on its context and the training examples in to a numeric vector
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Word2Vec

        public Word2Vec(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> sentences)
        Assumes whole dataset is passed in. This is purely meant for batch methods. Same as calling Word2Vec(Collection, int) with the second argument being 5
        Parameters:
        sentences - the sentences to use to train on

        Parameters:
        sentences - the sentences to be used for training
        minWordFrequency - the minimum word frequency to be counted in the vocab
